original_text: And five cubits was the one wing of the cherub, and five cubits the other wing of the cherub: from the uttermost part of the one wing unto the uttermost part of the other were ten cubits.
korean_text: 한 그룹의 이쪽 날개도 다섯 규빗이요 저쪽 날개도 다섯 규빗이니 이쪽 날개 끝으로부터 저쪽 날개 끝까지 십 규빗이며

sentences.original_text: And five cubits was the one wing of the cherub
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그룹의 한 날개는 다섯 규빗이었고

sentences.original_text: and five cubits the other wing of the cherub
from the uttermost part of the one wing
unto the uttermost part of the other were ten cubits
